text: int main ( ) { int i , j , n , t , * ptr ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; ptr = ( int * ) malloc ( n * sizeof ( int ) ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & ptr [ i ] ) ; int sum = n ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j < n - i ; j ++ ) { int min = ptr [ 0 ] ; if ( ptr [ i + j ] <= ptr [ i + j + 1 ] ) min = ptr [ i + j + 1 ] ; else sum = sum + j ; } } printf ( "%d" , sum ) ; } return 0 ; }
